definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: For the European commission chief is one of the luckiest guys in international politics.
sentences.chinese: 因为欧盟委员会主席实在是国际政坛幸运者之一。

sentences.english: It also is the chief entity behind the Convention on Cybercrime.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟委员会还是反网络犯罪公约的主要支持者。

sentences.english: And the European Commission is working on a response to the Eurogroup's complaint.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟委员会也对Eurogroup的抱怨做出回应。

sentences.english: regulate all the emissions that come from our territory, " said Artur Runge-Metzger, who heads the climate change strategy and international negotiations unit at the European Commission.
sentences.chinese: 他领导着欧盟委员会气候变化战略和国际谈判小组。

sentences.english: Still, the underlying reasons for it have some cogency.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟委员会建议的背后还有一些深层次的原因。

sentences.english: The European Commission also said that this wall can only be "short-term measures."
sentences.chinese: 欧盟委员会也表示，这种隔离墙只能是“短期措施”。

sentences.english: The programme is managed by the Commission's Information Society &Media Directorate-General.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划由欧盟委员会的信息社会与媒体执行署管理。

sentences.english: The Commission started the cartel investigation on its own initiative following a tip-off from an anonymous source.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟委员会根据一份匿名举报主动提起卡特尔调查。

sentences.english: The European Commission, the EU's executive arm, proposed the ban Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 星期二，欧盟执行机构欧盟委员会提议发布该禁令。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1
Ou1 zhou1 Zhong1 yang1 Yin2 hang2

definition: to withdraw from the European Union/abbr. for 脫離歐盟|脱离欧盟
abbr. for 歐洲共同體|欧洲共同体, European Community (old term for the EU, European Union)
